name: playwright_advanced_features
description: Codegen, test generation, accessibility, and mobile emulation

args: const { chromium } = require('playwright'); (async () => { const browser = await chromium.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); const snapshot = await page.accessibility.snapshot(); console.log('Accessibility tree:', JSON.stringify(snapshot, null, 2).substring(0, 200)); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Accessibility tree: {"role": "WebArea", "name": "Example Domain", "children": [...]

Accessibility data captured

args: const { chromium, devices } = require('playwright'); (async () => { const browser = await chromium.launch(); const pixel5 = devices['Pixel 5']; const context = await browser.newContext({...pixel5, locale: 'fr-FR', timezoneId: 'Europe/Paris'}); const page = await context.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); const userAgent = await page.evaluate(() => navigator.userAgent); console.log('Emulated:', userAgent.includes('Mobile')); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Emulated: true

Mobile device with locale/timezone

args: const { chromium } = require('playwright'); (async () => { const browser = await chromium.launch(); const context = await browser.newContext({storageState: {cookies: [{name: 'session', value: 'abc123', domain: 'example.com', path: '/'}], origins: []}}); const page = await context.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); const cookies = await context.cookies(); console.log('Preloaded cookies:', cookies.length); await browser.close(); })();
